description:
Mob is very busy preparing for the cultural fair that`s coming up in two weeks. Meanwhile, Serizawa is trying to start over, and is thinking about going to night school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haruaki Amakusa, Chasseur de fantômes ! ~ Les Cataspectres ~
Yokai Hunter Amakusa Haruaki Appears! The Threat of a Hundred Demons!!
Youkai Hunter: Amakusa Haruaki Toujou! Hyakki no Kyoui!!
妖怪ハンター・天草晴明登場! ~百鬼の脅威!!~
